title: Marina Cove has everything you need here!
posting_body: ['Visit us at Marina Cove and let us show you how apartment living should be!', "You'll have a wonderful home equipped with stainless steel kitchen appliances and such beautiful aesthetics that you'll never want to move anywhere else 📦", 'https://essexapts.info/Marina-Cove', '3480 Granada Avenue.', 'Santa Clara, CA 95051', 'show contact info', '📃 Lease apartment 1b 1ba apartment #207 for an 12month lease term', 'Priced at $2744', 'Lease Today!', "Don't Miss Out !", 'First floor || Quartz Counter tops || Washer and dryer included', 'Each of our garden-style apartment homes for rent is finished in modern style with quartz countertops, a combination of hardwood-style vinyl flooring and carpet, and sleek, streamlined finishes.', 'Additional conveniences include air conditioning, spacious storage closets, a washer and dryer, and your own private patio or balcony to enjoy the fresh air.', 'With 1- and 2-bedroom floor plans in a variety of layouts, we’re sure to have the right one for you.', 'And pet lovers can rejoice - dogs and cats are welcome at our pet-friendly apartments 🐾', 'Pet Deposit: $500', 'Dog Rent: $75', 'Cat Rent: $50']
